name: Foosball VR
description: Play the VR first table football simulator and feel close to real-world foosball sensation or... have fun with exploding balls! It's all up to you. The advanced physics ensures correct ball behaviour while smart AI delivers a fair dose of a challenge to keep you entertained.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
